Question: WeAccess.ai CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
WeAccess.ai

Product: AI-powered digital accessibility solutions

- AI-powered digital accessibility solutions for people with disabilities
- Focus on increasing participation in society and independence
- Services aimed at making the digital world accessible for the visually impaired
- Sustainable digital accessibility solutions powered by artificial intelligence
- Part of the Microsoft for Startups Founders Hub
- Emphasis on ADA compliance and inclusivity
- Aim to make the visual digital world barrier-free and accessible
- Focus on raising awareness and decreasing inequalities for visually impaired individuals
